title: Kadhal Vandhale Song Lyrics Singam
stanzas: <div>Kadhal Vandhale Song Lyrics Singam

everybody listen samba
pamba rumba thumba
everybody mambo chambo
pembo calling a party
everybody move it move it
move it move it now
everybody run-in come in
it's time to the party

everybody listen
samba pamba rumba
thumba thumba
everybody crew in
shaking moving
becoming naughty

everybody gorin gorin
gorin gorin goringo
everybody time to
move on life
isn't just a party!!!

kaadhal vandhaale
kaalu rendum thannale
kaatha suthuthae
undhan pinnale

aasai vandhaale
i love u sonnale
kannu rendum
suthuthae undhan munnale

thittam pottu paarthu
thimira peasi
ennai nee valaicha..
oh aae oh oaah..

vettaruvaa meesai
murikki murichu
en nenjai kalaichu..
oh aae oh oaah..

hey vaadi hey vaadi
nee vaada malli poothaandi
eduppu konda oosi
sirippu window acthaan

muthuku thaekku maram
muzhusa paatha joramthaan

nethi naduve pottu
vekkave kashtam aachu
unna nenachae oru
oram vachukkaren

munna pola naan illai
moththama mariyachu
kuthavazhiya kooda
konji kuppuduraen

nesama unnapathi
paesa naeram pathalada
methuva munnapola
boomi suthalada

chatiniâ€™ya vittu puttu
idiliya thinnuputaen
sattunu amma keka
aetho reeluvitaen

hey veera hey soora
nee ottikitta nenjupura

paarvai pattakathi
paayum ennai suthida
enakku eppovumae
ninaippu unnai pathithaan

meesai thirutha
chinna kathirikola vechaen
mutham nenappil
naanum mookkai vettikitaen

pattu pudavai katti
patunu kaalil vizha
pathu thadava thinam
othika pathukitaen

sathulla saapadella
thinu ninnu enn udamba
sattunu chola thotta
pola maathuriye

paatunu vetti paesi
mutti nikkum en gunaththa
kattithan pottu romba
saantham aakiriyae

hey paaru nee paaru
nee paatha manam jore jore

unnaku munnalathaan
nilavae dulla irukku
ennakku kitta thatta
idhayam fulla irukku

seo.title: Kadhal Vandhale Song Lyrics Singam
seo.description: Get the complete Kadhal Vandhale Song Lyrics Singam from Singam. Read the lyrics penned by Viveka and composed by Devi Sri Prasad(DSP) and sung by Baba Sehgal. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Viveka, Singam, Devi Sri Prasad(DSP), Baba Sehgal, Priyadharshini, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
